title: Instructional Design Workshop for Building a Pharmacy Education Assessment Culture

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of pharmaceutical education design and evaluation methods, experience with VR/simulation tools
context.additional_context: A blended workshop for professional learners, including activities for analyzing actual assessment data and designing simulation-based improvement strategies.

learning_goals: Participants can derive at least three actionable strategies for improving pharmacy education by analyzing assessment results
Participants can apply an instructional design framework to establish an assessment culture in VR-based simulation environments
Participants can build a real-time feedback system using formative assessment tools in BYOD environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
